title: Lynda - Type Project: Bauhaus Book Cover with Nigel French

Welcome to another installment of Type Project. In this short course, designer Nigel French provides a historical background on BauhausÃ¢â‚¬â€the influential German art school that operated from 1919-1933Ã¢â‚¬â€and then takes you through a step-by-step process to create a new design inspired by the original style, with Adobe Illustrator. The essence of this technique is distilled in the letterforms you'll create, based on Bauhaus leader Wassily Kandinsky's signature primary-colored shapes
